result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Don Corleon Robinson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: September 28, 2015 date cancelled as case dismissed with felony in Judge Brash's Court.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Don Corleon Robinson in court with attorney Andrew Joel Golden.  Defendant Don Corleon Robinson in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pursuant to plea negotations, and on motion of the State, Court ordered case DISMISSED to be used as a READ-IN.

Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court, defendant Don Corleon Robinson not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin; who was just assigned this case.  State requests an adjournment.  State has located their file.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State does not have their file.  Court unable to conduct plea hearing.  Matter sent back to Br. 37.

Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court, defendant Don Corleon Robinson not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 21, however DA file wasn't available. Defense counsel informs the Court again of defendant's pending felony case #15CF2958 with Branch 21. Approval for transfer GRANTED again by Deputy Court Clerk.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 21. Court ordered jury trial in Branch 37 on September 28, 2015 at 9:00 am. converted to status conference.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant's appearance waived for today's proceedings.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE. Defense counsel informs the Court of defendant's pending felony case #15CF2958 with Branch 21. Approval for transfer GRANTED by Deputy Court Clerk.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 21. Case remains calendared for jury trial in Branch 37 on September 28, 2015 at 9:00 am.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Don Corleon Robinson in court with attorney Andrew Joel Golden.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Final pre-trial conference held. Court ordered July 29, 2015 at 9:00 a.m. jury trial vacated.   Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 37.  Jury trial scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 09:00 am.
-Proposed Jury Instructions from Andrew Golden on behalf of his client; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-From Attorney Andrew Golden; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-Defendant's Motion In Limine from Attorney Andrew Golden on behalf of his client; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-Received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-State's Demand For Discovery And Inspection from Assistant District Attorney Brittany Kachingwe; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-State's Motion In Limine from Assistant District Attorney; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Justice Point Program report dated June 22, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Don Corleon Robinson in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci and Andrew Golden.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for final pre-trial. Defense John Krejci's motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Attorney Andrew Golden is new counsel to the case. Defense counsel requests new jury trial date. Court ordered jury trial date of May 6, 2015 at 9:00 a.m. vacated.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.    Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 37. Court ordered defendant report to Justice Point Program immediately after today's proceedings.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 09:00 am.
-Request and Consent For Substitution of Attorneys from Attorney Andrew J. Golden; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Justice Point Program report dated April 10, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Don Corleon Robinson in court with attorney John Matthew Krejci.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. Defense counsel requests jury trial date.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.    Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 37. Court ordered that defendant continue to cooperate with appointments with Justice Point Program.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Program report dated January 12, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
    No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MOSES C.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Don Corleon Robinson in court with attorney Anne M Jaspers.  Defendant Don Corleon Robinson in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
